1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-arrange
1.0.description:
Shopp 1.2 doesn't provide a native way to rearrange the order categories, shipping options, or payment gateways appear to users. This plugin solves all three of these problems and gives you full control over your store.

Donate?

If you use this plugin and find that it serves your needs well, please consider a donation.

Support

If you need support, e-mail clifgriffin+hireme@gmail.com.

Hire Me

Customizing Shopp is my bread and butter. If you need a Wordpress or Shopp developer, I'm available: clifgriffin+hireme@gmail.com

Version History

Version 1.0.3:

  • Fixed issue where empty categories cannot be arranged.
  • Minor cleanup.
  • Thanks to Peter Wooster for suggesting these enhancements.

Version 1.0.2:
